# It's strongly recommended that you change the root password *123456* to another one

= change root password in a persistent way =
{{{
remountrw
rebind on
chroot /ro
passwd 
history -c ; exit
rebind off
remountro
}}}


== Tip ==
_To get strong passwords, use pwgen. It can help you a lot!_
{{{
# example of usage
pwgen -c -n -s 12 1
}}}
